skills.name: docx
skills.description: Create, edit, and analyze Word documents with support for tracked changes, comments, formatting preservation, and text extraction

skills.name: pdf
skills.description: Comprehensive PDF manipulation toolkit for extracting text and tables, creating new PDFs, merging/splitting documents, and handling forms

skills.name: pptx
skills.description: Create, edit, and analyze PowerPoint presentations with support for layouts, templates, charts, and automated slide generation

skills.name: xlsx
skills.description: Create, edit, and analyze Excel spreadsheets with support for formulas, formatting, data analysis, and visualization

skills.name: algorithmic-art
skills.description: Create generative art using p5.js with seeded randomness, flow fields, and particle systems

skills.name: canvas-design
skills.description: Design beautiful visual art in .png and .pdf formats using design philosophies

skills.name: slack-gif-creator
skills.description: Create animated GIFs optimized for Slack's size constraints

skills.name: frontend-design
skills.description: Instructs Claude to avoid "AI slop" or generic aesthetics and to make bold design decisions. Works very well for React & Tailwind.

skills.name: artifacts-builder
skills.description: Build complex claude.ai HTML artifacts using React, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui components

skills.name: mcp-builder
skills.description: Guide for creating high-quality MCP servers to integrate external APIs and services

skills.name: webapp-testing
skills.description: Test local web applications using Playwright for UI verification and debugging

skills.name: brand-guidelines
skills.description: Apply Anthropic's official brand colors and typography to artifacts

skills.name: internal-comms
skills.description: Write internal communications like status reports, newsletters, and FAQs

skills.name: skill-creator
skills.description: Interactive skill creation tool that guides you through building new skills with Q&A
